#### For better documenting:
Function comments should include:

1. Behavior
2. Inputs(arguments)
3. Outputs(returned values)

For example, `__init__` should be described as follows:
```
def __init__(self, movie_title, movie_storyline, ...):
    """
    Initialize the movie instance.
    Inputs:
        movie_title     => Title of the movie
        movie_storyline => Summary of the movie
        ...
    Outputs: None
    """
```

Please check [this article](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0257/#multi-line-docstrings). There is another example.
